text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
There, the bulletin boards are<n>finished! I'll have everything<n>
princess-perfect in no time!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
You really don't mind helping me<n>though? Your whole day
was almost<n>ruined because of me.
choice_data_list: Well, it was kind of my fault too.
Well, it was kind of my fault too.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Wow, you're so sweet! You know, if I<n>ran into you and not
the wall, you'd be<n>the one full of holes right now!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After leaving the office, Kawakami<n>Princess gives me a
proper, heartfelt<n>apology for almost running over me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I apologize as well, explaining that I<n>wanted to help her
because I<n>should've been watching where I<n>was going.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Still, Tracen Academy is huge, isn't it?<n>Getting around the
whole school is<n>going to tire out even a princess like<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She talks about herself as if she's an<n>actual princess. I
wonder if that word<n>has some special meaning to her.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Oh, couldn't you tell by looking? Yep,<n>I'm a real-life
princess. Just like<n>Princess Fighter!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Tell me you've watched SpitfireCutie☆Princess Fighter before!Everyone has!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
She's a princess who races fair and<n>square against the
wicked Dark<n>Umamusume. She's the strongest<n>warrior
there is—Princess Fighter!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
She never loses heart because of all<n>the love and support
she gets from<n>her prince, Legendary Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I've wanted to become a princess<n>since I was a little kid.
Everyone<n>always tells me someone so wild<n>can't be one
though...

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I thought I was the worst. It got me<n>really down, but then
Princess Fighter<n>showed me what to do.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: "A princess is always beautiful,<n>graceful, and courageous!"

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Even a spitfire can be a princess!<n>That's why I came to
Tracen—to<n>become a strong, brave princess just<n>like
Princess Fighter!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Huh? Why's your face all scrunched<n>up?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Don't tell me you think I'm dreaming<n>too big. You wouldn't
joke around like<n>that, right?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
It's my dream—I'm the one who<n>decides it, and I'm the one
who will<n>achieve it.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
So what if I set high goals for myself?<n>I'm going to be just
like Princess<n>Fighter, then you'll see!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm really impressed by her daring<n>attitude. With conviction
like that, I bet<n>she'll become a terrific racer.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: What's this? Oh, if it isn't Kawakami.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Wah! I-it's you! K-King! It's been<n>s-so, er, since morning!
Good since<n>morning!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
"Good since morning?" I haven't<n>heard that before... Never
mind though.<n>What are you doing here?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Oh, uh, you see... It's not like it looks.<n>Air Groove... from the
student council...<n>told me I, uh...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Oh, are you helping the student<n>council now? Good for you!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
To become first-rate, one must act the<n>part, and that
includes thankless<n>service... Heh. An admirable effort.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: You know, if you need it, I could help<n>out if you want.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Whaaat?! Don't be crazy! This is my<n>job, so I've gotta do
it!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Oh, really? All right, I'll be on my way<n>then. Keep up the
good work.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: She's...

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Just wonderful! Perfect! Just look at<n>the way she carries
herself so<n>beautifully!
choice_data_list:
(She's got that look in her eyes like when she
was talking about Princess Fighter!)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I've been thinking—King might be the<n>Umamusume most like
Princess<n>Fighter in the world!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I mean it! She's already perfect!<n>She's got beauty,
refinement, dignity...
choice_data_list: You must really look up to her.
You must really look up to her.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I sure do! I've aspired to be like her<n>ever since I saw her
the first time I<n>came to the academy!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
She's always so grand and majestic.<n>And the way she
moves, it's like, uh...

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, that! She's elegant! That's<n>what really makes a<n>
princess—elegance!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: And she complimented me...This won't do at all! I've got to finishthese chores on my own!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Well, good day to you!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Huff... Puff...

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
(She complimented me! I was<n>complimented by King! I just
need to<n>keep it up a little longer until the<n>tryouts. Then I
can be a princess too!)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
(A princess... like King... Wait, can I<n>even compare to
King—like, be her<n>equal?)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami's Mother
text_block_list.text:
Here, look at this. The princess in this<n>book is well-behaved,
isn't she? If<n>you want to become a princess,<n>you'll have
to be nice and quiet like<n>her.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
(No way. Is that what Mom was<n>trying to tell me? That if I
can't be like<n>King, I can't become a princess?!)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: B-but I'm not anything like her!
